title: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: 1 gram fine silver Caribbean Treasures bar! Fully funded with 7500 Sats Mintage of 250Singles are $30 or 0.001128 ShippedIf you buy a bag of 10 $260 or 0.00978 ShippedI have about 11 bags leftSome of the coolest little bars on the market for trade.

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Oh damn, those little holders for them are also awesome. I'm happy you are selling more stuff, I think it's underrated myself.I'll have a think on these this weekend and get back to you. still owe ya a pm as well, sorry but tired!

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.created_time: August 20, 2023, 05:57:11 PMLast edit: August 28, 2023, 01:48:48 PM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on August 19, 2023, 01:17:39 AMOh damn, those little holders for them are also awesome. I'm happy you are selling more stuff, I think it's underrated myself.I'll have a think on these this weekend and get back to you. still owe ya a pm as well, sorry but tired!  Thanks! I love these little guys. They're made for those small transactions and for collectors that say they can't afford a silver wallet. Physical bitcoin wallets don't have to just be for the rich. There are many more affordable ones coming and the best are yet to come. Yeah, most people suffer from group think and fear of others  .I've been making physical bitcoins since 2014 and don't intend on stopping anytime soon. I love it.   If I can prevent the government from silencing or stopping just 1 transaction, it will all be worth it. . Not that I think the government can stop bitcoin, but they can stop and control the redemption from exchanges, making it difficult for those who don't know how to avoid them. That is why it is important to build the tools now before the regulations catch up to the exchanges free choice. These aren't necessarily for the here and now, but for the future, when miners only get small amounts of Sats for rewards and when the governments restrict  transactions from those they appose. It is written, you will not be able to buy and sell without their mark. I will go 1000 miles out of my way, not to comply, if freedom of choice is not on the table. "The Builder"cT

comments.author: owlcatz
comments.body: Right on. Just curious are those acrylic holders like airtight or just for display?

comments.author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
comments.body: Quote from: owlcatz on August 20, 2023, 06:31:16 PMRight on. Just curious are those acrylic holders like airtight or just for display? Yeah, They all come in a airtight capsules. They're hard to open though. I have to use a knife.
